QuestData.Title: Controlling their Stones
QuestData.Description:
Warlord Thunderwalker won't last much longer. Soon, his life essence will be completely drained.
Gor'groth mentioned that they are keeping him captive through the use of ward stones.
I want you to recover these ward stones and bring them here so we can release Thunderwalker.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Ward Stones from Jugnug, Wug, and Grunk, then use them to free Warlord Thunderwalker.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thank you for the aid, but saving me will not stop the ogres.
They already have enough life essence to complete the ritual!
